llama.responsibilities: Developing and maintaining Shopify based online stores. Developing Shopify applications (client-side & post-purchase & theme-app-extensions). Developing custom business logic using Storefont and Admin APIs. Integrating third-party services. Creating responsive UIs and modular components.  Creating project workflows, scripts and setting up CI/CD. Analyzing and optimizing product performance, structure and architecture. Estimating and setting right deadlines. Taking part in code reviews and providing feedback. Proposing technical solutions based on viable documentations. Assisting newcomer developers in getting started with company tech-stack.

epam.responsibilities: Took part in teamwork. Learnt basics of NestJs and practiced git commands and workflows. Was assigned to complete a project with required technologies that have to be learnt in the process of development.
